name: part_007
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026】Glitter of Love⧸誕生日記念3DLIVE【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [zzVcTQOdLZE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka's birthday 3D live performance of 'Diamond Crevasse'.

subtitles.original: Woh woh woh...
subtitles.english: Woh woh woh...

subtitles.original: ダイアモンド クレバス
subtitles.english: Diamond Crevasse

subtitles.original: 神様に恋をしていた頃は
subtitles.english: Back when I was in love with God...

subtitles.original: こんな別れが来るとは思ってなかったよ
subtitles.english: I never thought such a parting would come.

subtitles.original: Uh...
subtitles.english: Uh...

subtitles.original: もう二度と触れられないなら
subtitles.english: If I can never touch you again...

subtitles.original: せめて最後に
subtitles.english: then at least one last time...

subtitles.original: もう一度抱きしめて欲しかったよ
subtitles.english: I wanted you to hold me once more.

subtitles.original: Uh... It's long long goodbye
subtitles.english: Uh... It's long long goodbye.

subtitles.original: サヨナラ サヨナラ 何度だって
subtitles.english: Goodbye, goodbye, no matter how many times...

subtitles.original: 自分に 無情に言い聞かせて
subtitles.english: I heartlessly tell myself.

subtitles.original: 手を振るのは優しさだよね
subtitles.english: Waving goodbye is a kind of kindness, right?

subtitles.original: 今 強さが欲しい
subtitles.english: I want strength right now.

subtitles.original: あなたに出会い 輝いてあたしが生まれて
subtitles.english: Meeting you, I shone, and I was born.

subtitles.original: 愛すればこそ
subtitles.english: Precisely because I love you...

subtitles.original: 愛あればこそ
subtitles.english: precisely because there is love...

subtitles.original: 希望のない奇跡を待ってどうなるの
subtitles.english: what happens if I wait for a miracle without hope?

subtitles.original: 涙ににじむ 星の瞬きは go...
subtitles.english: The twinkling of stars, blurred by tears, go...

subtitles.original: (Vocalizing)
subtitles.english: (Vocalizing)

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ
subtitles.english: I won't forget...

subtitles.original: あなたのぬくもりも その優しさも
subtitles.english: your warmth and that kindness...

subtitles.original: 全て包んでくれた両手も
subtitles.english: or the hands that wrapped everything up.

subtitles.original: Uh... It's long long goodbye
subtitles.english: Uh... It's long long goodbye.

subtitles.original: サヨナラ サヨナラ 愛おしい人
subtitles.english: Goodbye, goodbye, my beloved.

subtitles.original: あなたがいたから 歩いてこれた
subtitles.english: Because you were there, I was able to walk on.

subtitles.original: 一人なんかじゃなかったよね
subtitles.english: I wasn't alone, was I?

subtitles.original: 今 答えが欲しい
subtitles.english: I want an answer right now.

subtitles.original: 燃えるような流星捕まえて
subtitles.english: Catching a burning shooting star...

subtitles.original: 火を灯して
subtitles.english: and lighting a fire...

subtitles.original: 愛していたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep loving you...

subtitles.original: 愛されてたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep being loved.

subtitles.original: 切れた体一つで世界はどうなるの
subtitles.english: With just a torn body, what will happen to the world?

subtitles.original: 張りつめ続けてた
subtitles.english: My bluff...

subtitles.original: 虚勢が溶けて long fall
subtitles.english: that I've kept strained melts away, long fall.

subtitles.original: どうしてなの 涙あふれて
subtitles.english: Why is it? Tears overflow...

subtitles.original: 止められない
subtitles.english: and I can't stop them.

subtitles.original: あなたに出会い 輝いてあたしが生まれて
subtitles.english: Meeting you, I shone, and I was born.

subtitles.original: 愛すればこそ
subtitles.english: Precisely because I love you...

subtitles.original: 愛あればこそ
subtitles.english: precisely because there is love...

subtitles.original: 希望のない奇跡を待ってどうなるの
subtitles.english: what happens if I wait for a miracle without hope?

subtitles.original: 涙ににじむ 星の瞬きは go...
subtitles.english: The twinkling of stars, blurred by tears, go...

subtitles.original: もし生まれ変わって また巡り会えるのなら
subtitles.english: If I am reborn and we can meet again...

subtitles.original: その時もきっと あたしを見つけだして
subtitles.english: then surely find me even then.

subtitles.original: もう二度と離さないで捕まえてて
subtitles.english: Catch me and never let go again.

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないとささやいて
subtitles.english: Whisper that I'm not alone.
